content: प्रलप् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To speak, talk; वचो वै देहीति (वैदेहीति) प्रतिपदमुदश्रु प्रलपितं <ls>S. D. 6.</ls> {@--2@} To talk at ran dom or incoherently, prate, chatter talk wildly or nonsensically; प्रलपत्येष वैधेयः <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--3@} To lament, mourn, cry, bewail. {@--4@} To call, invoke.
